credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
title: Vase
description: Ochre-colored clay body, cast.  Tall tapering cylindrical body with slightly bulbous shoulder, rises to rim; no foot.  Modeled in low relief around body with three groups of lily triads with the central flower in full bloom at shoulder. Stems extend to base.  Pale gray-yellow matte glaze covers the surface.  Bottom partially glazed.
name: Vase
